channel.title: How to make players member
channel.description:
I've got a small problem, when i turn the member status in the character file to 1,the player isn't a member. Neither am i (admin). Is there any other file i should edit ?
Thanks!
Grtz

item.title: How to make players member
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

No, don’t listen to Eugene4250.

Usually, it doesn’t work because you are LOGGED IN while you are trying to make the changes. Tell your specified player to log out for 15 seconds, then log back in. While they are logged out, make the changes and save. When they are back on, they will be member.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
